chunks: How to Participate Objective Scheduled City For More Information Niveshak Shivir aims to simplify investor services, promote financial literacy and strengthen investor protection to: • Facilitate the transfer of unpaid dividends (held for 6–7 years). • Assisting with KYC and nomination updates with the company. • Resolving pending IEPFA claims of unclaimed and unpaid shares and dividends. To take this vision forward, the pilot phase of Niveshak Shivir will be organised in Pune. Please visit our official website at www.iepf.gov.in. You can also follow us on our social media channels for the latest updates and announcements related to Niveshak Shivir. We encourage all claimants to take advantage of this opportunity to have their concerns addressed directly by our experts. Your engagement is crucial in helping us provide better service and support.
